entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
